ComicInfo.Penciller: Denys Cowan,Rags Morales,Tyler Kirkham,Denys Cowan,Rags Morales,Tyler Kirkham
ComicInfo.Series: Dark Nights: Death Metal Infinite Hour Exxxtreme!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Part Three: Lobo Land!: Lobo uses the Death Metal to create a pocket universe where he plays the role of all heroes. Brainiac confronts Lobo to convince him to give up the Death Metal to save the Multiverse.
Part Two: What the Frag Is a Death Metal Anyway?!: In search of Death Metal, Lobo travels to Blackhawk Island where he battles Black Monday, and then teams with Hawkman to secure the Death Metal.
Part 1: The Batman Who Frags: Lobo battles a Batman from the Dark Multiverse who has injected himself with Czarnian DNA to become the Batman Who Frags. Lex Luthor hires Lobo to retrieve samples of Death Metal with the fate of the Multiverse at stake.
ComicInfo.Teams: Teen Titans,The Titans,Suicide Squad,Justice League Dark
ComicInfo.Title: Part Three: Lobo Land!; Part Two: What the Frag Is a Death Metal Anyway?!; Part 1: The Batman Who Frags
ComicInfo.Writer: Becky Cloonan,Frank Tieri,Sam Humphries,Sam Humphries,Becky Cloonan,Frank Tieri
